outdatedPackage: Version %s is out of date! Update package to work with
oldVersion: It looks like you are using an old version of XCoder. Current actual version: %s. To update use
scToJson_description: Converts sc files to readable separate .json files
jsonToSc_description: Makes changes from .json files to .sc file
scMerge_description: Merges files in a folder into one file
sheetToSc_description: Converts a sequence of sprites to .sc file
scToFla_description: Converts .sc file to .fla file for Adobe Animate
illegalSize: Illegal image size! Expected %sx%s but we got %sx%s
resize_qu: Would you like to resize an image?
compression_qu: Select the type of compression that will be used to compress files:
packer_qu: Want to use Texture Packer? It is needed for optimized image sequence conversion and .fla files conversion
animate_qu: Want to use Adobe Animate? This includes functions for converting sc to fla and vice versa
lzma_describe: Always used in Brawl Stars. Very slow but compression ratio is very high.
fastLzma_describe: Much faster than LZMA but compression ratio is slightly reduced.
zstd_describe: Used in Clash games. The best method in relation to time and compression ratio
wrongInputFile: Input file is not specified or is invalid!
